4.name: Sol
4.text:
"Ooooo... This is a tavern... A whole new
world..."

5.name: Erick
5.text:
"Yeah. It has a pretty nice atmosphere, doesn't
it? Oh, there he is. Hey! Mark-kun!"

6.name: Adventurer
6.text:
"Oh? Erick, what's up? Do you have some free time
today? And also, over there... Oh?"

7.name: Erick
7.text:
"This child is the golden dragon that Eni-sensei
raised! Her name is Sol-chan, you know!"

8.name: Adventurer
8.text:
"Oh, this child is the one who... has taken human
form but is a golden dragon. Amazing."

9.name: Erick
9.text:
"The first time I saw her... she was, how should I
put it? Despite being a powerful dragon, she's
incredibly cute!!"

11.name: Erick
11.text:
"She's like a friendly, silly dog from the
neighborhood, you know?"

14.name: Erick
14.text:
"So, like I was saying. If you're free, Mark-kun,
won't you help out? Fighting alongside a golden
dragon would be the best for someone aspiring to
be a lord, right?"

15.name: Adventurer
15.text:
"Don't just assume I have free time. Well, I do
consider myself to belong to the domain of good.
If asked for assistance by a golden dragon, I
would gladly respond."

16.name: Sol
16.text:
"T-Then, Mark-kun, please!! Please lend me your
strength!!"

17.name: Adventurer
17.text:
"Ah, I'm Mark. I'm aiming to be a lord, but for
now, I'm a warrior. Nice to meet you, little
dragon lady."

25.name: Barkeeper
25.text: "Oh, welcome Sol-chan. We have a customer."

28.name: Minstrel
28.text:
"The heroic Magmedor gallantly drew his sword and
declared, 'Behold, our god! Tonight shall be a
feast of slaughter───' Oh, the princess was moved
to tears by his words..."

30.name: Minstrel
30.text:
"Oh Magmedor-sama, you are the true hero...
Please, take me with you... But Magmedor did not
look back... He has a great oath to fulfill...
With the weeping princess behind him, the great
hero Magmedor departed..."

33.name: Narration
33.text:
As the minstrel finished singing, the satisfied
audience left. And the only one left in that place
was a beautiful silver-haired woman who still
murmured "noble" with a sorrowful expression,
deeply moved by the song. Upon closer inspection,
a silver tail extended from her waist...

35.name: Isk
35.text:
"Um, a-are you okay...? ...Ah, could it be, you
are Sol-sama...? The Gold Dragon, Sol-sama...?"

36.name: Sol
36.text: "Y-Yes! I'm Sol!! Um... and you are...??"

37.name: Isk
37.text:
"I am Isk Vorel. I am the Silver Dragon. It is my
greatest pleasure to listen to and collect stories
from the human world..."

38.name: Sol
38.text:
"Ohhhhh... Silver Dragon-san!!!! This is my first
time meeting someone from the same race!!!
Ohhhhh...!!!"

40.name: Isk
40.text:
"Lukrea Village is a very nice village... I also
would like to stay in this village for a little
while..."

41.name: Isk
41.text:
"I have heard from Teacher Eni-tuura-ya, but...
this village is Sol-sama's territory, isn't it...?
If so, I would like to pay my respects... It would
be rude for an outsider dragon to wander around
the territory without greeting and disturb your
mood..."

42.name: Sol
42.text:
"Oh, from the teacher!! I see, that's what it
was!! Nice to meet you too, Isk-san! Let's be
friends!! Ehehe~"

43.name: Isk
43.text:
"Friends... yes, that's right... allies, isn't
it... Let's get along, Sol-sama. Yes... I'm
happy..."
